channel.title: Version 8.2 :: Cap'n Hugo Relearrrn Theme
channel.description: 8.2.0 (2025-11-01) Enhancements [feature] button: add more styl'n #1154 [feature] boxstyle: support style parameter as default fer user defined styles #1149 [feature] i18n: add Danish translat'n #1148 [feature] topbar: introduce CSS color variables #863 Fixes [bug] mermaid: donâ€™t ignore codefence zoom attribute #1150 Maintenance [task] build: make it build from any directory #1155 [task] code: regenerate chroma styles #1152 [task] test: switch t' hvm #1151
